subject: Labour's deputy leadership candidates on Newsnight tonight
body:

						DEPUTY LEADERSHIP HOPEFULS ON NEWSNIGHT TONIGHT





In tonight's programme, Jeremy Paxman will cross-examine the six candidates for the deputy leadership of the Labour Party in a Newsnight special.


Hilary Benn, Hazel Blears, Jon Cruddas, Peter Hain, Harriet Harman and Alan Johnson will take part in the first televised hustings of the contest.


What questions would you like Jeremy to put to them?


Click here to post your thoughts on our website and we'll arm him with the best for the programme.


Watch the debate live on Newsnight at 10.30pm on BBC TWO.
